## Example 2 (Continuous Biomarker)

```{r}
source("R/setting2.R")
```

### Simulation Setting

```{r}
n <- 1000
beta <- 1
lambda0 <- 0.05 * (1:5) # rep(.01, 7)
lambda0_s <- 0.1 * (8:4)
```

### Data Simulation

```{r}
data2 <- mkdata2(
  n = n, 
  beta = beta, 
  lambda0 = lambda0, 
  lambda0_s = lambda0_s)
t0 <- data2$t0
d0 <- data2$d0
z <- data2$z
X <- matrix(z)
```

### Simulated Data

```{r}
data2
```

### Model Fitting

```{r}
ini <- c(beta, lambda0, lambda0_s)
model_fit(t0, d0, X, initial = c(ini[1], qlogis(ini[-1])))
```

proc.time()
